card.name: Angel of Glory's Rise
card.property: Flying When Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

card.name: Angel of Jubilation
card.property: Flying Other nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1. Players can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though Innistrad is not cleansed of evil, we finally have cause to rejoice."

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.property: You gain 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."

card.name: Angelic Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside." —Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

card.name: Archangel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky rang with the cries of armored seraphs, and the darkness made a tactical retreat.

card.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
card.property: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

card.name: Banishing Stroke
card.property: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Builder's Blessing
card.property: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mix the mortar with holy wards, or blood will run in the streets." —Vadvar, Thraben stonewright

card.name: Call to Serve
card.property: Enchant nonblack creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2, has flying, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grace is a gift, never a reward.

card.name: Cathars' Crusade
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.

card.name: Cathedral Sanctifier
card.property: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."

card.name: Cloudshift
card.property: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn." —Elder Rimheit

card.name: Commander's Authority
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Human creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear her symbol with honor, a sign of faith upheld and honest deeds bravely done."

card.name: Cursebreak
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No longer the village pariah. No longer taunted and shamed. Sigrun was finally free.

card.name: Defang
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once vampires are disarmed, they're given wooden swords and forced to assist in the training of Midnight Duelists.

card.name: Defy Death
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gisela cornered the murderous demon among the graves of the dead villagers. "A fitting end," she murmured as she raised her sword.

card.name: Devout Chaplain
card.property: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By Avacyn's decree, we shall cleanse these relics of their demonic past."

card.name: Divine Deflection
card.property: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Divine Deflection deals that much damage to any target.

card.name: Emancipation Angel
card.property: Flying When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

card.name: Entreat the Angels
card.property: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Farbog Explorer
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd slog through a thousand swamps to help one soul find rest."

card.name: Goldnight Commander
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One faith, but many hands in victory."

card.name: Goldnight Redeemer
card.property: Flying When Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Host sings of Avacyn's return without a single verse about its own suffering.

card.name: Herald of War
card.property: Flying Whenever Herald of War attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Angel spells and Human spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Herald of War.

card.name: Holy Justiciar
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. If that creature is a Zombie, exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her eyes see through the rotting flesh and glimpse a soul in agony, begging for the Blessed Sleep.

card.name: Leap of Faith
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The finest maneuvers take place in three dimensions.

card.name: Midnight Duelist
card.property: Protection from Vampires

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Avacyn's return did not rid him of his desire for revenge.

card.name: Midvast Protector
card.property: When Midvast Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I cultivated my faith in Avacyn despite meager returns. Now my faith is repaid."

card.name: Moonlight Geist
card.property: Flying {3}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Moonlight Geist this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wails and whispers are the only weapons she has left.

card.name: Moorland Inquisitor
card.property: {2} {W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

card.name: Nearheath Pilgrim
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Nearheath Pilgrim is paired with another creature, both creatures have lifelink.

card.name: Restoration Angel
card.property: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Riders of Gavony
card.property: Vigilance As Riders of Gavony enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Human creatures you control have protection from creatures of the chosen type.

card.name: Righteous Blow
card.property: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters will no longer find safety under the mists of Morkrut!" —Bruna, Light of Alabaster

card.name: Seraph of Dawn
card.property: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She parts the clouds so sunlight can reach even the darkest lairs and duskiest tombs.

card.name: Silverblade Paladin
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Silverblade Paladin is paired with another creature, both creatures have double strike.

card.name: Spectral Gateguards
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Spectral Gateguards is paired with another creature, both creatures have vigilance.

card.name: Terminus
card.property: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Thraben Valiant
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once more into Devil's Breach, soldiers. I want another devil tail for my collection."

card.name: Voice of the Provinces
card.property: Flying When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

card.name: Zealous Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cower, fiend. The night is yours no longer."

card.name: Alchemist's Apprentice
card.property: Sacrifice Alchemist's Apprentice: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Side effects may include foul odors, scalding steam, and spontaneous nonexistence.

card.name: Amass the Components
card.property: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

card.name: Arcane Melee
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Debates between wizards are never purely academic.

card.name: Captain of the Mists
card.property: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap Captain of the Mists. {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am no mere ship's captain. The north wind is my accomplice. The tide is my first mate."

card.name: Crippling Chill
card.property: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

card.name: Deadeye Navigator
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Devastation Tide
card.property: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to argue with a force made of divine will.

card.name: Dreadwaters
card.property: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

card.name: Elgaud Shieldmate
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Elgaud Shieldmate is paired with another creature, both creatures have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Favorable Winds
card.property: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long thought to be extinct, flocks of gryffs reappeared with Avacyn's return.

card.name: Fettergeist
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Fettergeist unless you pay {1} for each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The choices of the living will tether them in death.

card.name: Fleeting Distraction
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first spell taught to young mages, it has spared the lives of many whose hands are too small to hold a sword.

card.name: Galvanic Alchemist
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Galvanic Alchemist is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{2}{U}: Untap this creature."

card.name: Geist Snatch
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Angels and demons aren't the only ones listening to your prayers.

card.name: Ghostform
card.property: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Ghostly Flicker
card.property: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

card.name: Ghostly Touch
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap or untap target permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Geists wish to make themselves known. I'm merely the vessel for their efforts."

card.name: Gryff Vanguard
card.property: Flying When Gryff Vanguard enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghouls smashed the door, but I heard the call of the gryffs and knew we were saved." —Ekka, shopkeeper of Hanweir

card.name: Havengul Skaab
card.property: Whenever Havengul Skaab attacks, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An abomination so violent that the other fiends tremble at the sight of it.

card.name: Infinite Reflection
card.property: Enchant creature When Infinite Reflection enters the battlefield attached to a creature, each other nontoken creature you control becomes a copy of that creature. Nontoken creatures you control enter the battlefield as a copy of enchanted creature.

card.name: Into the Void
card.property: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the 'diplomatic' approach." —Terhold, archmage of Drunau

card.name: Latch Seeker
card.property: Latch Seeker can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It seeks a tomb that will hold it, a coffin that will give it rest.

card.name: Lone Revenant
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Lone Revenant deals combat damage to a player, if you control no other creatures, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Lunar Mystic
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm pleased this world has learned the moon affects more than the tides." —Tamiyo, the Moon Sage

card.name: Mass Appeal
card.property: Draw a card for each Human you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have emerged triumphant from the darkness. Let our hard-won wisdom guide us to prosperity."

card.name: Mist Raven
card.property: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in." —Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

card.name: Misthollow Griffin
card.property: Flying You may cast Misthollow Griffin from exile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For some creatures, existing is only a whim.

card.name: Nephalia Smuggler
card.property: {3} {U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My drivers are trustworthy. I removed their tongues myself. Any other questions?"

card.name: Outwit
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The student asks how a spell is begun. The master ponders what ends it.

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.property: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

card.name: Rotcrown Ghoul
card.property: When Rotcrown Ghoul dies, target player puts the top five cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look into its eyes. It's thinking things no dead thing should think." —Captain Eberhart

card.name: Scrapskin Drake
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach." —Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Second Guess
card.property: Counter target spell that's the second spell cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see where you're going with that. I don't like it." —Dierk, geistmage

card.name: Spectral Prison
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice Spectral Prison.

card.name: Spirit Away
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear of slipping from the geist's tenuous grip overwhelmed Tolo's joy at his first flight.

card.name: Stern Mentor
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Stern Mentor is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard."

card.name: Stolen Goods
card.property: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tamiyo, the Moon Sage
card.property: +1: Tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. −2: Draw a card for each tapped creature target player controls. −8: You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size" and "Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to your hand."

card.name: Tandem Lookout
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

card.name: Temporal Mastery
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery. Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Vanishment
card.property: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library. Miracle {U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Wingcrafter
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

card.name: Appetite for Brains
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 4 or greater and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as with a peach, the first bite is always the juiciest.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.property: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all make sacrifices for the good of Innistrad." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Blood Artist
card.property: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

card.name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death not for survival but for vanity and pleasure? This is the decadence I sought to curb." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ." —Gisa the Mad

card.name: Butcher Ghoul
card.property: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.

card.name: Corpse Traders
card.property: {2} {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Crypt Creeper
card.property: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I guess what they say is true. What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Or at least stranger." —Captain Eberhart

card.name: Dark Impostor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."

card.name: Death Wind
card.property: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leukin stared at the smoldering angel feathers. "Run!" he screamed to his patrol. "We don't stand a chance!"

card.name: Demonic Rising
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you control exactly one creature, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is the greater folly, summoning the demon or expecting gratitude from it?

card.name: Demonic Taskmaster
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Demonic Taskmaster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Subservience to greater power is the only law in the pit.

card.name: Demonlord of Ashmouth
card.property: Flying When Demonlord of Ashmouth enters the battlefield, exile it unless you sacrifice another creature. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Descent into Madness
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a despair counter on Descent into Madness, then each player exiles X permanents they control and/or cards from their hand, where X is the number of despair counters on Descent into Madness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stairs lead down in both directions.

card.name: Dread Slaver
card.property: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Half a brain rules the mindless.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.property: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

card.name: Essence Harvest
card.property: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Captain Lewenheart uncovered evidence of a demon cult among the clergy. The Skirsdag never gave him a chance to prove his case.

card.name: Evernight Shade
card.property: {B}: Evernight Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Exquisite Blood
card.property: Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even as humans regained the upper hand, some still willingly traded their lives for a chance at immortality.

card.name: Ghoulflesh
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The body dies in stages. First the skin, then the muscle. The brain is last, much to the victim's dismay.

card.name: Gloom Surgeon
card.property: If combat damage would be dealt to Gloom Surgeon, prevent that damage and exile that many cards from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He roams the streets of Havengul seeking the sick and delirious so that he may cure them of their lives.

card.name: Grave Exchange
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a cold, dark journey either way." —Eruth of Lambholt

card.name: Griselbrand
card.property: Flying, lifelink Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him." —Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Harvester of Souls
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all." —Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

card.name: Homicidal Seclusion
card.property: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +3/+1 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Damned crows and their endless squawking . . . blocks out the voices in my head . . ." —Hermit of Hanne Hall

card.name: Human Frailty
card.property: Destroy target Human creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen a hundred mortal families rise and fall. I shall outlast a thousand more." —Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Hunted Ghoul
card.property: Hunted Ghoul can't block Humans.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even after Hanweir was saved, Gisa's lost ghouls would shamble through, still following the twisted orders of their imprisoned master.

card.name: Killing Wave
card.property: For each creature, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I come looking for demons and I find a plane full of angels. I hate angels." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Maalfeld Twins
card.property: When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who am I to break up a family?" —Gisa the Mad

card.name: Marrow Bats
card.property: Flying Pay 4 life: Regenerate Marrow Bats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how far we push into Stensia, undeath will always remain in these lands." —Terhold, archmage of Drunau

card.name: Mental Agony
card.property: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His mind is feeble. Feed him to the bats."

card.name: Necrobite
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An undead snake doesn't bite in self-defense. It hungers as any zombie, never sated.

card.name: Polluted Dead
card.property: When Polluted Dead dies, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the zombie attack, crops withered on the vine, and the thriving village became a ghost town almost overnight.

card.name: Predator's Gambit
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1. Enchanted creature has intimidate as long as its controller controls no other creatures. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever cornered a wounded vampire? That's a walk in the cathedral garden in comparison." —Tristen, Cathar Marshal

card.name: Searchlight Geist
card.property: Flying {3}{B}: Searchlight Geist gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rises with the fall of darkness, seeking souls to extinguish.

card.name: Soulcage Fiend
card.property: When Soulcage Fiend dies, each player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.

card.name: Treacherous Pit-Dweller
card.property: When Treacherous Pit-Dweller enters the battlefield from a graveyard, target opponent gains control of it. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Triumph of Cruelty
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen corpses prettier than you, beastmage." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Undead Executioner
card.property: When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heartless killer in life, brainless killer in death.

card.name: Unhallowed Pact
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

card.name: Aggravate
card.property: Aggravate deals 1 damage to each creature target player controls. Each creature dealt damage this way attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Barbarians! They burned my favorite chair! We'll kill them all!" —Anje Falkenrath

card.name: Archwing Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste At the beginning of the end step, return Archwing Dragon to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Swifter than an angel, crueler than a demon, and relentless as a ghoul.

card.name: Banners Raised
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the destruction of the Helvault, fearful mobs soon became fearless battalions.

card.name: Battle Hymn
card.property: Add {R} for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A church is just wood and walls. A congregation is the faithful praising the angels." —Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

card.name: Bonfire of the Damned
card.property: Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Burn at the Stake
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Burn at the Stake deals damage to any target equal to three times the number of creatures tapped this way.

card.name: Dangerous Wager
card.property: Discard your hand, then draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "C'mon friend, take a turn tossing the knucklebones. What've you got to lose?" —Tobias, trader of Erdwal

card.name: Demolish
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To truly defeat a skaberen, you must destroy not the monster but the lab." —Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

card.name: Dual Casting
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hours after the Helvault opened, his powers returned twice as strong as before.

card.name: Falkenrath Exterminator
card.property: Whenever Falkenrath Exterminator deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}{R}: Falkenrath Exterminator deals damage to target creature equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Falkenrath Exterminator.

card.name: Fervent Cathar
card.property: Haste When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll put my sword down only to die. And I don't plan on doing that today."

card.name: Gang of Devils
card.property: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, how could I know they'd explode?" —Gregel, township militia

card.name: Guise of Fire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire will eventually destroy a zombie, but a fiery zombie destroys a lot of other things first." —Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

card.name: Hanweir Lancer
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

card.name: Havengul Vampire
card.property: Whenever Havengul Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Havengul Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That slowly decreasing pulse—that's the beat I waltz to."

card.name: Heirs of Stromkirk
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever Heirs of Stromkirk deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Hound of Griselbrand
card.property: Double strike Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Kessig Malcontents
card.property: When Kessig Malcontents enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of Humans you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Discontent is a powerful weapon in the hands of a mob.

card.name: Kruin Striker
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Kruin Striker gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unhappy with the creation of the wolfir, Rorica broke with her order and led a crusade against the "reformed werewolves."

card.name: Lightning Mauler
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Lightning Mauler is paired with another creature, both creatures have haste.

card.name: Lightning Prowess
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Undead flesh is dry and papery. A single spark and 'poof.' No more ghoul."

card.name: Mad Prophet
card.property: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no heron in the moon! It's a shrew, a five-legged shrew, with a voice like whispering thunder!"

card.name: Malicious Intent
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As peace returned to Thraben, some cathars made the mistake of letting down their guard.

card.name: Malignus
card.property: Malignus's power and toughness are each equal to half the highest life total among your opponents, rounded up. Damage that would be dealt by Malignus can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It descended on Estwald like a sudden storm. Moments later, only ashes and agony remained.

card.name: Pillar of Flame
card.property: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some tried cremating their dead to stop the ghoulcallers. But the dead returned, furious about their fate.

card.name: Reforge the Soul
card.property: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards. Miracle {1}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a wave of spells called the Cursemute, Avacyn cleansed the world with divine fire.

card.name: Riot Ringleader
card.property: Whenever Riot Ringleader attacks, Human creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So the vampires like hot blood, do they? Let's see how they handle ours."

card.name: Rite of Ruin
card.property: Choose an order for artifacts, creatures, and lands. Each player sacrifices one permanent of the first type, sacrifices two of the second type, then sacrifices three of the third type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skirsdag cultists refused to quietly accept Avacyn's ascendancy.

card.name: Rush of Blood
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's not for sustenance or to feed the dependence. Sometimes it's just to feel again.

card.name: Scalding Devil
card.property: {2} {R}: Scalding Devil deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Somberwald Vigilante
card.property: Whenever Somberwald Vigilante becomes blocked by a creature, Somberwald Vigilante deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has nothing left but his resentment.

card.name: Stonewright
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Stonewright is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Thatcher Revolt
card.property: Create three 1/1 red Human creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dark times left the peasantry ready to fight with whatever weapons were at hand.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.property: Choose one — • Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My next aerial design will use less metal." —Hadaken, alchemist of Nephalia

card.name: Thunderous Wrath
card.property: Thunderous Wrath deals 5 damage to any target. Miracle {R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded
card.property: +1: Draw a card, then discard a card at random. −4: Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player. −6: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Tyrant of Discord
card.property: When Tyrant of Discord enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses a permanent they control at random and sacrifices it. If a nonland permanent is sacrificed this way, repeat this process.

card.name: Uncanny Speed
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To survive, we must embrace the savagery we knew in our race's infancy." —Edgar Markov

card.name: Vexing Devil
card.property: When Vexing Devil enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 4 damage to them. If a player does, sacrifice Vexing Devil.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not any fun until someone loses an eye.

card.name: Vigilante Justice
card.property: Whenever a Human enters the battlefield under your control, Vigilante Justice deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It begins as a whisper and ends with the red roar of fire.

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
card.property: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Abundant Growth
card.property: Enchant land When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Blessings of Nature
card.property: Distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures. Miracle {G} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Borderland Ranger
card.property: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

card.name: Bower Passage
card.property: Creatures with flying can't block creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the darkest hours, some denied Avacyn. Now the Kessig wilds are their only haven.

card.name: Champion of Lambholt
card.property: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

card.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
card.property: Haste When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its footsteps of today are the lakes of tomorrow.

card.name: Descendants' Path
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's a creature spell that shares a creature type with a creature you control. Otherwise, put that card on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Diregraf Escort
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Diregraf Escort is paired with another creature, both creatures have protection from Zombies.

card.name: Druid's Familiar
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Druid's Familiar is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +2/+2.

card.name: Druids' Repository
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a charge counter on Druids' Repository. Remove a charge counter from Druids' Repository: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Eaten by Spiders
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying and all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After sampling many victims, the spider developed a preference for the undead and their accoutrements.

card.name: Flowering Lumberknot
card.property: Flowering Lumberknot can't attack or block unless it's paired with a creature with soulbond.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It used to eat us trappers. Now it follows us around like some kind of hound dog." —Alena, trapper of Kessig

card.name: Geist Trappers
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Geist Trappers is paired with another creature, both creatures have reach.

card.name: Gloomwidow
card.property: Reach Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The abandoned towns on the moors didn't stay empty for long.

card.name: Grounded
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've tracked Ludevic's monster across four provinces. When it lands, make sure it stays put." —Alena, trapper of Kessig, to Halana of Ulvenwald

card.name: Howlgeist
card.property: Creatures with power less than Howlgeist's power can't block it. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Joint Assault
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's paired with a creature, that creature also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By my power, werewolves shall become the wolfir, our allies in combat against darkness." —Avacyn's Cursemute Decree

card.name: Lair Delve
card.property: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all creature and land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fiends have fled. Well, good riddance. Nothing I like more than an empty lair."

card.name: Natural End
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I killed one and found bricks and bones in its belly. It had eaten a whole cottage, thatch and all." —Paulin, Somberwald trapper

card.name: Nightshade Peddler
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Nightshade Peddler is paired with another creature, both creatures have deathtouch.

card.name: Pathbreaker Wurm
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Pathbreaker Wurm is paired with another creature, both creatures have trample.

card.name: Primal Surge
card.property: Exile the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you do, repeat this process.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Avacyn's return, the flow of life became a tidal wave.

card.name: Rain of Thorns
card.property: Choose one or more — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the forests became havens for evil, the archmages devised new ways to cleanse the wilds.

card.name: Revenge of the Hunted
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +6/+6 and gains trample, and all creatures able to block it this turn do so. Miracle {G} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Sheltering Word
card.property: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Snare the Skies
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hunter's precision and a durkvine's strength are a potent combination.

card.name: Somberwald Sage
card.property: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can face any danger when all of nature is on your side."

card.name: Soul of the Harvest
card.property: Trample Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.

card.name: Terrifying Presence
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by creatures other than target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elmut had slaughtered vampires, slain werewolves, and destroyed hordes of zombies. Sadly, he never got over his fear of spiders.

card.name: Timberland Guide
card.property: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

card.name: Triumph of Ferocity
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rid me of this curse, witch, or die with me." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Trusted Forcemage
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Trusted Forcemage is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +1/+1.

card.name: Ulvenwald Tracker
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where'd the werewolves go? Maybe that got hungry."—Halana of Ulvenwald

card.name: Wandering Wolf
card.property: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Humans still feared wolves, though no connection between them and the curse of lycanthropy had ever been proved.

card.name: Wild Defiance
card.property: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of an instant or sorcery spell, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When civilization reaches out its greedy hand, take it off at the wrist." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Wildwood Geist
card.property: Wildwood Geist gets +2/+2 as long as it's your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The geists that dwell in the deep forests of Kessig are as untamable as the woods themselves.

card.name: Wolfir Avenger
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Wolfir Avenger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Released from a dark curse and bound to a higher calling.

card.name: Wolfir Silverheart
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Wolfir Silverheart is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +4/+4.

card.name: Yew Spirit

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wonder what dwelled in the primordial forests before humans existed." —Elder Rimheit

card.name: Bruna, Light of Alabaster
card.property: Flying, vigilance Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
card.property: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Sigarda, Host of Herons
card.property: Flying, hexproof Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

card.name: Angel's Tomb
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith can quicken the stones themselves with life." —Writings of Mikaeus

card.name: Angelic Armaments
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a white Angel in addition to its other colors and types. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forged in dark hours from the flame that would not die.

card.name: Bladed Bracers
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. As long as equipped creature is a Human or an Angel, it has vigilance. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forged from the rubble of the Helvault.

card.name: Conjurer's Closet
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Gallows at Willow Hill
card.property: {3}, {T}, Tap three untapped Humans you control: Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Haunted Guardian
card.property: Defender, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drain the victim's blood, sell the corpse, and use the soul on guard duty. No muss, no fuss, no problems." —Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Moonsilver Spear
Narstad Scrapper
card.property: {2}: Narstad Scrapper gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, the principles of corpse animation applied to bloodless materials!" —Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Otherworld Atlas
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on Otherworld Atlas. {T}: Each player draws a card for each charge counter on Otherworld Atlas.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool can open it. But it takes a genius to decipher the blank pages." —Kordel the Cryptic

card.name: Scroll of Avacyn
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Scroll of Avacyn: Draw a card. If you control an Angel, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Words to bless the eye that reads them, telling of a future beyond the reach of fear.

card.name: Scroll of Griselbrand
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Scroll of Griselbrand: Target opponent discards a card. If you control a Demon, that player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Words no eyes should see, telling of things no sane mind could fathom.

card.name: Tormentor's Trident
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and attacks each combat if able. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a demon there is no such thing as restraint.

card.name: Vanguard's Shield
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and can block an additional creature each combat. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wars are not fought on a single front.

card.name: Vessel of Endless Rest
card.property: When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Alchemist's Refuge
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {G}{U}, {T}: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Persecuted alchemists fled deep into Kessig's wilds, seeking solitude to continue their ghoulish craft.

card.name: Cavern of Souls
card.property: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Desolate Lighthouse
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lonely sentinel facing gales, hurricanes, and tides of homicidal spirits.

card.name: Seraph Sanctuary
card.property: When Seraph Sanctuary enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Slayers' Stronghold
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its courtyards are lit during every hour of the day so that night may never fall within its walls.
